name: Gmail - remove ads
description:
All credits to http://easylist.adblockplus.org/easylist-element_rick752.txt
Last Modified : August, 2nd 2006

Thanks to user 577 for the collapse of empty space left on the page.

In order to hide google ads, have a look at style 353.

In order to make the google search window wider, have a look at style 520.

In order to hide yahoo ads, have a look at style 350.

In order to hide other ads, have a look at style 357.
